row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.PROMPTSET.DELETE_BLOB
row.description: Delete an existing Blob from Storage Container

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="565"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Delete Azure Storage Blob"><properties><entry name="text">Delete Azure Storage Blob</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_NAME#

<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_SNAPSHOTs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Snapshot" tooltip="Snapshot of the blob in the date-time format (Example 2011-03-09T01:42:34.9360000Z) or '*' to remove all the snapshots but not the blob." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_CONTAINER_NAME#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_CONTAINER_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="[0-9a-z-]{3,63}" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Container Name" tooltip="Storage container name length: 3 to 63 characters, numbers, lower-case letters and - only.
